title: Demi Rose splits from boyfriend Chris Martinez as they decide they're better as friends
text:

Demi Rose has split from her DJ boyfriend Chris Martinez.

The stunning model and her beau have parted ways after almost two years together.

Demi, 24, was first linked to Chris in 2017, with them going public with their romance in December that year after they were spotted kissing at an airport in Madrid.

But now, it's all over, although they've declared they'll stay friends.

A representative for Demi told MailOnline : "Unfortunately Demi & her boyfriend Chris Martinez have parted ways.

"They have ended as friends and continue to support each other through out their careers.

"Demi is single and very happy working on her career in the USA."

(Image: @themartinezbros/Instagram)

Demi appears to have last shared a picture of her and Chris together back in April, last year.

She's sitting on his knee as he sits on a throne and they're leaning in for a kiss.

She captioned it: "My King"

(Image: @themartinezbros/Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

He posted a snap of her in March, this year, to wish her a happy birthday.

The pair stand in front of a flower wall as he wraps his arms around her and plants a kiss on her forehead.

He wrote: "HAPPY 24TH BIRTHDAY TO THE MOST BEAUTIFUL SOUL I EVER MET. LOVE YOU MA @demirosemawby"

On February 14, he posted a picture of them stood on an airport runway in front of a private jet.

He said: "Happy Valentine’s Day! no words can amount to how special you are to me"

description: The model and her DJ beau have gone their separate ways after almost two years of dating, with her representatives confirming the split
